projects: [{"title":"Privacy Enhanced Conversational AI using Large Language Models","start_date":"Aug 2023","end_date":"May 2024","description":"Developed a highly accurate LLM-based local chatbot that can run on custom sensitive data while ensuring availability and security against data breaches through IPFS and cryptographic techniques"},{"title":"Comparative Study of Conventional Classifiers & Genetic Algorithms based Classifier","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Developed a fully working and efficient feature selection and multi-class classification model using genetic algorithms, and evaluated their efficiency against traditional classifiers by conducting a comparative study"}]
